name: Angry Keeper: Shooting game
description:
“Master! Birds are attacking us. Help!”
Danger has come to a peaceful pig farm.
One day, the birds suddenly started to attack the pigs, and the pigs couldn’t do anything about it.
You must take up your rubbergun to protect these poor pigs.
Aim with one hand and shoot with the other.
If you have used up all your ammo, shake your device to reload.
By using your rubber gun, you can defeat the birds without killing them.
Let us see if you can safely protect the pigs.
Good luck!
